Family Owned & Operated Since 1977

Diversified Investment Firm

From tacos to tech to timeless properties, Trion Holdings partners with businesses that are ready to scale and make an impact.

Building & Scaling Businesses Since 1977

A diversified investment firm based in New York, Trion partners with companies across real estate, hospitality, and beyond—providing the expertise, network, and capital to unlock growth, create value, and position businesses for expansion or a successful exit.

For more than 45 years, we've invested in, acquired, and partnered with businesses ready to scale. Our approach blends disciplined investing and operational expertise with a powerful network of industry professionals.

Our mission is simple: deliver the resources and guidance that allow entrepreneurs and operators to work smarter, build faster, and create meaningful value—whether for long-term growth or a strategic exit.

Investment & Acquisition Partners

We are proud to partner with a diverse group of companies and entrepreneurs who share our commitment to quality, innovation, and growth.

Learn More

Insurance Program

At Trion Holdings, we understand that protecting real estate and business investments requires trusted insurance solutions. That's why we've created the Trion Holdings Insurance Program—an exclusive service that connects our partners with our network of preferred insurance brokers and carriers.
